title: A Closet Full of Robert (with Dewayne Perkins)
itunes:title: A Closet Full of Robert (with Dewayne Perkins)
description:
Is R. Kelly actually innocent of his terrible, terrible crimes? Absolutely not, but Langston and his guest Dewayne Perkins (The Amber Ruffin Show on Peacock) consider all of the evidence in this disappointing Chicago legend.
